summary: Aliens in human disguise commandeer a rural airport during a snowstorm. To survive, the people trapped inside must determine which of their own is not of this Earth.
cast: Bruce Campbell|Chase Masterson|C. David Johnson|Kedar Brown|Andrew Tarbet|Sarah Lafleur|Marcia Bennett|Chuck Byrn|Jason Jones|Stephen Joffe|Hannah Lochner|Dylan Bierk|Ian Downie|Scott Wickware|Jake Simons
keywords: man tied up|tied to a pole|airport|security guard|prisoner
title: Invasión final
